On Fri, 10 Sep 1999, Richard Ashkettle wrote:
>
> My big question. Am I making a mistake that will bite
> me at later levels? (Shada....help me out here) Every
> weapon I've heard about that is decent damage for
> bards at high levels is 1H Slash. Did I, for
> roleplaying purposes, limit my usefulness at later
> levels? I really like the bard I created, as he is

Yes, this is actually a gripe of mine too. As far as I know,
the damage/delay ratios on the best piercing weapons top out
around 0.28. Every piercing weapon with a higher ratio than
that is rogue-only. In contrast, there are several generic 1h
slash weapons that go all the way up to 0.33.
